items.title: Two-Weapon Fighting
items.content: When you take the Attack action with a light melee weapon, you can use a bonus action to attack with a different light melee weapon in your other hand. You don't add your ability modifier to the damage unless it's negative.

items.title: Cunning Action (Rogue)
items.content: As a Rogue, you can use a bonus action to Dash, Disengage, or Hide.

items.title: Bardic Inspiration (Bard)
items.content: As a Bard, you can use a bonus action to inspire another creature, giving them a Bardic Inspiration die.

items.title: Spells with Bonus Action Casting Time
items.content: Some spells have a casting time of 1 bonus action. If you cast a spell as a bonus action, you can't cast another spell during the same turn, except for a cantrip with a casting time of 1 action.

items.title: Rage (Barbarian)
items.content: As a Barbarian, you can enter a rage as a bonus action, gaining advantages in combat.

items.title: Flurry of Blows (Monk)
items.content: As a Monk, after taking the Attack action, you can spend 1 ki point to make two unarmed strikes as a bonus action.
